PolicyPage.title: Warranty & Service Policy
PolicyPage.returnDescription: If the customer changes their mind or wants to exchange the item within 24 hours of purchase, they can do so for free.
PolicyPage.manufacturerDefectsDescription: If there is a problem with the internal hardware or software (the "set"), the item will be replaced with a new one.
PolicyPage.userInflictedDamageDescription: If the damage is caused by the user (accidental damage):
PolicyPage.payForParts: The customer must pay for the cost of replacement parts.
PolicyPage.partWarrantyDescription: We provide a 1-year warranty on all original replacement parts used during repairs.
PolicyPage.inspectionDescription: Customers are required to test and inspect their device thoroughly before leaving the shop to ensure the repair is successful.
PolicyPage.liabilityDescription: Once the device leaves the shop premises, we are no longer liable for any external damage or non-warranty issues. This policy is in place to ensure mutual protection and service quality.

AboutPage.headline: Your Trusted Partner in Mobile Technology Since 2025
AboutPage.intro: Established in 2025, we began with a simple mission: to make high-quality mobile technology accessible and worry-free for everyone.
AboutPage.mission: Whether you are looking for the latest brand-new flagship or a certified pre-owned (second-hand) device, we believe you deserve a phone that works perfectly. That is why we don't just sell phones; we back them up with our industry-leading 1-year replacement warranty.
AboutPage.expertlyVettedDesc: Every second-hand phone undergoes a rigorous inspection to ensure it meets our high standards.
AboutPage.technicalSupportDesc: We are a full-service shop. If you break it, we fix it—offering free labor for all accidental repairs.
AboutPage.honestyFirstDesc: We are transparent about our products and our policies, ensuring you never leave our shop with a doubt.
AboutPage.closing: At {projectName}, we aren't just building a business; we are building a community of happy, connected mobile users.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.intro: At VANDAITUI, we value your trust and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you visit our shop or use our services.
PrivacyPage.section1Content: We collect basic contact information to provide our services effectively. This includes:
PrivacyPage.section1Point1: Full Name and Contact Number for order processing and repair service tracking.
PrivacyPage.section1Point2: Device information (model, serial number) for warranty and service records.
PrivacyPage.section2Content: When you entrust your mobile device to us for repair or maintenance, we prioritize your data privacy:
PrivacyPage.section2Point1: Our technicians are trained to respect customer privacy and only access parts of the system necessary for the repair.
PrivacyPage.section2Point2: We recommend customers back up their data and remove sensitive information or passcodes where possible before servicing.
PrivacyPage.section2Point3: VANDAITUI implements strict internal protocols to ensure your device data is not accessed, copied, or shared without your explicit consent.
PrivacyPage.section3Content: We maintain a strict 'No-Sell' policy regarding customer data:
PrivacyPage.section3Point1: Your personal information will never be sold, rented, or traded to third parties for marketing or any other purposes.
PrivacyPage.section3Point2: We only share information with third parties when necessary to complete your service (e.g., shipping partners) or as required by law.
PrivacyPage.section4Content: You have the right to request access to the personal information we hold about you or ask for its correction or deletion. For any privacy-related inquiries, please contact us directly at our shop or via our official channels.
PrivacyPage.compliance: This policy is designed to be professional and compliant with standard e-commerce and consumer protection guidelines.

TermsPage.title: Terms of Service
TermsPage.intro: Welcome to VANDAITUI. By accessing our website, purchasing our products, or using our repair services, you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions.
TermsPage.section1_1Content: While we strive to keep our inventory accurate, some items may be out of stock. If a specific model (New or Second-hand) is unavailable, we can place a special order for you. A deposit may be required.
TermsPage.section1_2Content: All pre-owned devices undergo a rigorous 100% functionality test. Customers acknowledge that second-hand items may have minor cosmetic wear.
TermsPage.section1_3Content: We reserve the right to change prices without notice or cancel orders resulting from technical pricing errors.
TermsPage.section2_1Content: If you are unsatisfied with your purchase, you may exchange it for another model within 24 hours for free (provided the item is in original condition).
TermsPage.section2_2Content: For brand-new units, any manufacturer hardware defects within the first one year will qualify for a one-to-one replacement with a new unit.
TermsPage.section2_3Content: If the device is damaged by the user (drops, spills, etc.), VANDAITUI provides Free Service Labor. The customer is only responsible for the cost of replacement parts.
TermsPage.section3_1Content: We provide a 1-year warranty on all original replacement parts used during repairs.
TermsPage.section3_2Content: Customers are required to inspect and test their device thoroughly before leaving the shop. VANDAITUI is not liable for issues reported once the device has left the premises.
TermsPage.section3_3Content: Customers must back up all data before repair. We are not responsible for data loss.
TermsPage.section3_4Content: Repairs on water-damaged or severely cracked devices carry a risk of underlying failure. We are not liable for pre-existing issues found during repair.
TermsPage.section3_5Content: Devices left for more than 60 days after completion notice may be sold to recover costs.
TermsPage.section4_1Content: We accept Cash, Bank Transfer, and Mobile Payments.
TermsPage.section4_2Content: Orders for stock items may be canceled before shipping. Special orders may be subject to a non-refundable deposit. For repairs, a diagnostic fee may apply if work has already commenced.
TermsPage.section5Content: VANDAITUI shall not be liable for any indirect or consequential damages. Our total liability is strictly limited to the amount paid for the specific product or service.
TermsPage.section6Content: Users agree not to use this website for any unlawful purpose, including fraudulent transactions or the distribution of malicious software.

HowItWorksPage.title: How It Works
HowItWorksPage.headline: How to Shop with VANDAITUI
HowItWorksPage.intro: Buying a phone or booking a repair should be simple. Follow these easy steps to get started:
HowItWorksPage.step1BrowseDesc: Visit our Shop page to see our latest New and Second-hand phones.
HowItWorksPage.step1DetailsDesc: For second-hand phones, read the description for the condition and battery health. Every device is 100% tested by our experts.
HowItWorksPage.step1SpecialDesc: If the model you want is out of stock, contact us via WhatsApp. We will source the device specifically for you.
HowItWorksPage.step2CartDesc: Once you've found your device, click 'Add to Cart' and proceed to checkout on our website.
HowItWorksPage.step2WhatsAppDesc: Prefer to chat? Click the green WhatsApp button on the bottom-left corner to order directly through WhatsApp.
HowItWorksPage.step2CheckoutDesc: Enter your delivery details and choose your preferred payment method (Cash, Bank Transfer (Touch and Go, Mercentrade).
HowItWorksPage.step2ConfirmationDesc: You will receive a confirmation message with your order number. For special orders, we will contact you regarding the deposit and estimated arrival date.
HowItWorksPage.step3DeliveryDesc: Choose between home delivery or picking up your device at our physical store.
HowItWorksPage.step3TrialDesc: Once you receive your phone, you have 24 hours to test it. If you change your mind, you can exchange it for a different model—no questions asked!
HowItWorksPage.repairStep1Desc: Use our Services page to find your repair type (e.g., Screen Replacement) or send us a message via WhatsApp for a custom quote.
HowItWorksPage.repairStep2Desc: Bring your phone to our shop. Remember to back up your data before you arrive!
HowItWorksPage.repairStep3Desc: Our technicians will fix your phone using original parts. Most repairs are completed within 1-2 days.
HowItWorksPage.repairStep4Desc: Before you pay and leave, our staff will ask you to test the device to ensure everything is working perfectly.
HowItWorksPage.repairStep5Desc: Enjoy peace of mind with our 1-year warranty on all replacement parts and free labor for future accidental damage.
HowItWorksPage.contactUs: Contact us anytime via the green WhatsApp button or visit our Contact page for more options.
